attributes.action: severe sentences for drivers who cause carnage and kill
attributes.background: I am a fuel tanker driver and am seeing to much carnage on our roads

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for sentencing, that is the responsibility of the courts. You to submit a petition calling on Parliament to introduce stronger minimum sentences for specific crimes.
